abstract: Google is pressing for an extension to the Justice Department’s oversight of Microsoft‘s business practices, which for the most part is set to expire in November, according to a court filing Monday.
lead_paragraph: Google is pressing for an extension to the Justice Department’s oversight of Microsoft‘s business practices, which for the most part is set to expire in November, according to a court filing Monday.

headline.main: Google Seeks Ruling on Microsoft Oversight

abstract: Want to undo a whole bunch of changes in a Microsoft Word document — without having to repeatedly hit Control-Z (Command-Z on the Mac) to back up one change at a time?
snippet: Want to undo a whole bunch of changes in a Microsoft Word document — without having to repeatedly hit Control-Z (Command-Z on the Mac) to back up one change at a time?
lead_paragraph: TIP OF THE WEEK Want to undo a whole bunch of changes in a Microsoft Word document — without having to repeatedly hit Control-Z (Command-Z on the Mac) to back up one change at a time? In most versions of Word, just go to the Standard toolbar — or the Quick Access toolbar in Word 2007 — and find the Undo Typing icon, which looks like an arrow curving down and to the left.

headline.main: Tip of the Week: Undoing Changes in Microsoft Word

abstract: Google loses a round against Microsoft in court, but takes another blow against one of Microsoft’s most sensitive areas: corporate e-mail.
snippet: Google loses a round against Microsoft in court, but takes another blow against one of Microsoft’s most sensitive areas: corporate e-mail.
lead_paragraph: Google’s jabs at Microsoft came on multiple fronts this week.

headline.main: Google v. Microsoft, In and Out of Court
